events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but my package still hasn't arrived and the tracking info hasn't updated in days.
The issue is classified under Delivery Delay, given the customer's concern about shipping and tracking status.
A customer service agent has been assigned to review and respond to the customer's delivery delay complaint.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand your package hasn't arrived yet, and I'm here to help solve this issue.
Could you please provide me with your order number and any tracking details you have so I can investigate the shipment status?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The tracking number is 1Z999AA10123456784, but it shows 'in transit' without any update for a week.
Thank you for the details. I've contacted the shipping carrier to request an update and expedited handling. We expect to provide you with news within 24 hours.
I appreciate your quick response and help. Looking forward to hearing back soon about the delivery status.
The carrier informed us that your package was delayed due to weather but will be delivered by end of day tomorrow. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
Hello, just checking in to confirm that you have received your package and that everything is in order. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since the delivery issue has been resolved and the package was received, we are closing this case. Feel free to reach out anytime.
